Question
========

From a population of asthmatics, a sample of 6 individuals is drawn and their vital lung capacity (in liters) is measured, with the outcomes: 2.47, 2.25, 2.65, 2.00, 3.41, 2.22. This variable is measured on

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level
* Ordinal measurement level
* Interval level
* Ratio measurement level

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level: Incorrect
* Ordinal measurement level: Incorrect
* Interval measurement level: Incorrect
* Ratio measurement level: Correct
